> Sorry again if I sounded offensive.

No offense taken.  You imagine someone to be a typical 25 yo nerd and 
he's in fact 45, married with children and named Al :-)

> I haven't jumped on the BLOG bandwagon yet.  What do you think it brings
> to the table that an email group doesn't?  Is it a presentation issue
> (which could be a strength)?  Are there other strengths?

I see several reasons to not post on the ml:

* I don't seek advise, I'm only presenting _my_ POV
* I don't try to convince others
* the posts will be often OT for this list
* if you don't agree, just ignore me

The ml is more like a discussion or hotline when a weblog tends to be 
short personal POVs.

-Vladimir
